data.meta_description: Chief MacDonald was struck and killed by a vehicle while directing traffic at a local high school's homecoming football game.<br...
data.text:
St. Clair City Police Department, Michigan

End of Watch Friday, October 12, 1962

Add to My Heroes

John D. MacDonald

Chief MacDonald was struck and killed by a vehicle while directing traffic at a local high school's homecoming football game.

Chief MacDonald was survived by his wife and two sons.

Bio

Age Not available

Tour Not available

Badge CHIEF

Incident Details

Cause Struck by vehicle
